favourite.article: This a great song from the Lord...to mend all the broken hearts...to all who have experience loss and brokenness..the Lord is our Restorer. He will never let you fall.
This song is so sweet! It's the kind of song You can sing when you've lost everything except the Lord, "Draw me Lord, I would gladly let thee win and yield my sword!" Amen.
I saw in this song that absolute surrender to the Lord, is possible only after the absolute defeat of self.Only He can subdue and after that draw us...His does that in us.
